text: Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life Is Calling is a 1986 biographical comedy drama movie directed by and starring Richard Pryor as Jo Jo Dancer a popular stand up comedian, who is burned himself alive while freebasing cocaine. == Other websites == * * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Ohio Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about drugs
title: Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life Is Calling
